sentences.sContent: Hugh’s jacket was old and shabby.

sentences.sCn: 一个衣衫褴褛的流浪汉

synos.tran: 破旧的；卑鄙的；吝啬的；低劣的

words.tran: 衣衫褴褛地，破旧地；不体面地；卑鄙地

remMethod.val: sha(拼音： 杀) ＋ bby(看作baby， 婴儿) → 杀死婴儿的 → 卑鄙的

trans.tranOther: shabby clothes, places, or objects are untidy and in bad condition because they have been used for a long time
